intro: The most basic Ninjutsu， serving to transform the user.
name: Ninjutsu - Transform

intro: A mighty body is the base for everything.
name: Basic Taijutsu

intro: Basic Taijutsu， serving to punch and kick the opponent at high speeds.
name: Taijutsu - Fierce Wind

intro: To gather Chakra at your feet then climb a tree is the most basic Ninjutsu training.
name: Chakra Gathering

intro: One simple Ninjutsu， allowing user to evade attacks by swapping identities with one object in a flash.
name: Ninjutsu - Body Replacement Technique

intro: Sense the opponent‘s Chakra Flow to prepare defense.
name: Chakra Interaction

intro: Destroy the opponent‘s defense by massive palm power to increase the user‘s critical strike.
name: Taijutsu - Arhat Fist

intro: An esoteric technique that gathers Chakra at the fingertips to attack the opponent‘s weakest point.
name: Ultimate - One-thousand-year strike

intro: One of the Hachimon Tonkō Taijutsu. Opening each gate allows the user to surpass their own physical limits.
name: Taijutsu - Gate of Healing

intro: High speed whirl attack.
name: Taijutsu - Front Lotus

intro: The most basic Katon technique， allowing the user to attack with fireballs.
name: Katon - Pongsona Fire Technique

intro: A substitute made of stone and soil can block damage.
name: Suiton - Water Puppet

intro: Transform the user‘s body into liquid to evade physical attacks.
name: Doton - Earth Clone

intro: Gather Chakra at the hands， and then attack to cause physical and Chakra damage.
name: Fūton - Cyclone Fist

intro: Use Chakra to cover the user in a compacted layer of sand to absorb damage.
name: Doton - Sand Clone

intro: High speed kick attack.
name: Taijutsu - Konoha Fierce Wind

intro: A simple Genjutsu that disorientates the opponent.
name: Genjutsu - False Surroundings

intro: A basic Ninjutsu， consuming Chakra that disturbs the opponent‘s vision by creating shadows.
name: Ninjutsu - Clone

intro: Master Katon Ninjutsu.
name: Katon Expert

intro: Master Fūton Ninjutsu.
name: Fūton Expert

intro: Master Suiton Ninjutsu.
name: Suiton Expert

intro: Master Doton Ninjutsu.
name: Doton Expert

intro: Master Raiton Ninjutsu.
name: Raiton Expert

intro: The technique of absorbing natural power to control Senjutsu Chakra.
name: Senjutsu

intro: The unique Kekkei Genkai of Uchiha Clan.
name: Sharingan

intro: The unique Kekkei Genkai of Hyuga Clan， granting incredible visual capability to its wielder.
name: Byakugan

intro: The Ninjutsu to heal wounds with Chakra power.
name: Byakugan

intro: The unique Kekkei Genkai of Yotsuki Clan， giving its wielder the ability to manipulate their own skeletal structure.
name: Shikotsumyaku

intro: Use Chakra threads to control puppets like marionettes．
name: Kugutsu no Jutsu

intro: Master of Hijutsu.
name: Hijutsu Expert

intro: The esoteric technique of Nara Clan to manipulate shadows.
name: Shadow Imitation Technique

intro: The unique Kekkei Genkai of Haku.
name: Hyōton

intro: The esoteric technique of Aburame Clan to attract and manipulate insects with Chakra.
name: Insect Gathering

intro: Your strength will be increased significantly for a short while. Meanwhile， your body will suffer serious damage.
name: Hachimon Tonkō

intro: The legendary Rinnegan， the greatest Visual Jutsu.
name: Rinnegan

intro: One of the Hachimon Tonkō Taijutsu. Opening each gate allows the user to surpass their own physical limits.
name: Taijutsu - Gate of Pain

intro: A Taijutsu stronger than Front Lotus， attacking opponents like a violent storm.
name: Taijutsu - Ura Renge

intro: Convert gathered Chakra into a large fireball to cause deadly damage.
name: Katon - Gōkakyū

intro: Create clones out of water to absorb damage.
name: Suiton - Water Clone

intro: Coat the user‘s body with stones to make them much more resistant to attacks.
name: Doton - Hidden Rock

intro: Cover the user in armor made of compacted layers of sand.
name: Doton - Armor of Sand

intro: Attack the target with bladed weapons formed by rapidly spinning wind.
name: Fūton - Wind Blade

intro: Attack the target with a rapid whirlwind kick.
name: Taijutsu - Konoha Cyclone

intro: A Genjutsu mentally destroying the target by displaying their most terrifying images.
name: Genjutsu - Hell Viewing

intro: An enhanced version of the Rasengan with wind Chakra， very powerful.
name: Fūton - Rasengan

intro: A shield made of sand manipulated by Chakra， offering great defense.
name: Doton - Shield of Sand

intro: Advanced Clone Technique， using Chakra to create an intangible copy of one‘s own body.
name: Ninjutsu - Kage Bunshin

intro: One of the Hachimon Tonkō Taijutsu. Opening each gate allows the user to surpass their own physical limits.
name: Taijutsu - Gate of View

intro: Kick the target into air， and then pound.
name: Taijutsu - Shadow of the Dancing Leaf

intro: Gather Chakra to breath fire in a straight line， incredible powerful.
name: Katon - Dragon Fire

intro: Protect the user with a wall of water against physical damage.
name: Suiton - Water Walls

intro: Turn the user into Petrifaction， solidly blocking technique damage.
name: Doton - Petrifaction

intro: Inherits the will of fire
name: Will of Fire

intro: Inherits the will of wind
name: Will of Wind

intro: Inherits the will of water
name: Will of Water

intro: Inherits the will of earth
name: Will of Earth

intro: Inherits the will of lightning
name: Will of Lightning

intro: Inherits the sage body of the sage of six paths
name: Sage

intro: Advanced form of Sharingan， a powerful eye technique.
name: Mangekyō Sharingan

intro: The absolute defense technique of the Hyuga clan. Only those with Byakugan can use it.
name: Revolving Heaven

intro: The best Medical Ninjutsu that can heal wounds quickly
name: Reincarnation

intro: Hijutsu that can only be used by those with Shikotsumyaku - Kekkei Genkai.
name: Dance of Bones

intro: Advanced Kugutsu no Jutsu
name: Black Kugutsu no Jutsu

intro: Masters all forbidden techniques.
name: Kinjutsu Expert

intro: An Advanced shadow technique of the Nara clan.
name: Shadow Seam

intro: Hijutsu technique that can only be used by those with Hyōton - Kekkei Genkai.
name: Realm of Blood

intro: A secret technique of the Aburame clan. It uses the bugs hidden in the body to fight.
name: Kikaichū no Jutsu

intro: A secret taijutsu that can only be used when the Hachimon Tonkō are open.
name: Hirudora

intro: A Kinjutsu that can only be used by those with Rinnegan. It is a matter of life and death.
name: Outer Path - Heavenly Life

intro: Creates thousands of clones with chakra.
name: Kinjutsu - Multiple Kage Bunshin Technique

intro: Builds a raccoon-like shield to protect the player
name: Doton - Shield of Shukaku

intro: A ninjutsu that gives wind chakra to Rasengan. It is very powerful.
name: Fūton - Rasenshuriken

intro: Advanced Konoha Cyclone.
name: Taijutsu - Konoha Great Cyclone

intro: Advanced Genjutsu that can rebound other genjutsus.
name: Genjutsu - Mirror Heaven and Earth

intro: One of the Hachimon Tonkō Taijutsu. Opening each gate allows the user to surpass their own physical limits.
name: Taijutsu - Gate of Death

intro: A taijutsu that creates powerful continuous attacks.
name: Taijutsu - Lion Missiles

intro: Creates a heating dragon with chakra.
name: Katon - Great Dragon Fire

intro: Summons a great amount of water to create water walls.
name: Suiton - Water Waves

intro: Defensive Dotons Ninjutsu.
name: Doton - Earth-Style Wall

intro: An ultimate Kinjutsu that enters a pact with death.
name: Kinjutsu - Shiki Fūjin

intro: The Yang force of Six Paths Sage has been inherited by Asura.
name: Yang Force

intro: The Ying force of Six Paths Sage has been inherited by Indra.
name: Ying Force

intro: Six Paths‘ Sceptre contains endless chakra.
name: Sage Sceptre

intro: Six Paths‘ weapon is destructive.
name: Sage Blade

intro: Six Paths‘ weapon is destructive.
name: Amenonuhoko

intro: Six Paths‘s ultimate Jutsu that contains Unlimited Tsukuyomi.
name: Rinne Sharingan

intro: Ninjutsu owned by the 9 tails can cancel out all Ninjutsu
name: Gudōdama

intro: Sealed 10 Tails‘ Ultimate Chibaku Tensei
name: Six Paths Chibaku Tensei

intro: Special equipment for Awakening.
name: Shadow Armlet - Fire

intro: Special equipment for Awakening.
name: Shadow Armlet - Water

intro: Special equipment for Awakening.
name: Shadow Armlet - Lightning

intro: Special equipment for Awakening.
name: Shadow Armlet - Earth

intro: Special equipment for Awakening.
name: Shadow Armlet - Wind

intro: Rasengan added with a unique Chakra Transformation， allowing it to disappear from sight.
name: Vanishing Rasengan

intro: Unique eye prowess with the ability to detect hidden Chakra on the enemies.
name: Jōgan

intro: Uses lightning abilities to create spheres of electrical energy to attack enemies.
name: Raiton - Lightning Ball

intro: Jutsu consisting of Lightning Release-enhanced combined with super strength.
name: Thunderclap Drill

intro: Generates a discharge of electricity in the shape of snakes to electrocute enemies.
name: Raiton - Snake Lightning

intro: Hashirama's ultimate ninjutsu, can only be used in sage mode. Rare ninjutsu, obtained via exchange event.
name: Chojo Kebutsu

intro: Crest of the Uzumaki clan. Rare ninjutsu, obtained via exchange event.
name: Uzumaki Crest

intro: Crest of Akatsuki. Rare ninjutsu, obtained via exchange event.
name: Akatsuki Crest

intro: Naruto's ultimate ninjutsu. Rare ninjutsu, obtained via exchange event.
name: Choodama Rasengan

intro: Ultimate genjutsu. Rare ninjutsu, obtained via exchange event.
